com.braintreegateway
Class BraintreeGateway

java.lang.Object
  com.braintreegateway.BraintreeGateway

public class BraintreeGateway
extends java.lang.Object

This is the primary interface to the Braintree Gateway. It is used to interact with:

  • Addresses
  • CreditCards
  • Customers
  • Subscriptions
  • Transactions
Quick Start Example: 
 import java.math.BigDecimal;
 import com.braintreegateway.*;
 
 public class BraintreeExample {
 
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        BraintreeGateway gateway = new BraintreeGateway(
            Environment.SANDBOX, 
            "the_merchant_id", 
            "the_public_key", 
            "the_private_key"
        );
    
        TransactionRequest request = new TransactionRequest().
            amount(new BigDecimal("100.00")).
            creditCard().
                number("4111111111111111").
                expirationDate("05/2012").
                done();
    
        Transaction transaction = gateway.transaction().sale(request).getTarget();
        System.out.println("Transaction ID: " + transaction.getId());
        System.out.println("Status: " + transaction.getStatus());
    }
 }

Constructor Detail

BraintreeGateway

public BraintreeGateway(Environment environment,
                        java.lang.String merchantId,
                        java.lang.String publicKey,
                        java.lang.String privateKey)
Instantiates a BraintreeGateway. Use the values provided by Braintree.

Parameters:
environment - Either Environment.SANDBOX or Environment.PRODUCTION.
merchantId - the merchant id provided by Braintree.
publicKey - the public key provided by Braintree.
privateKey - the private key provided by Braintree.

trData

public java.lang.String trData(Request trData,
                               java.lang.String redirectURL)
Returns encoded transparent redirect data for the given Request and redirect URL

Parameters:
trData - the transparent redirect data as a Request object.
redirectURL - the redirect URL for the user after the transparent redirect POST.
Returns:
a String of encoded transparent redirect data.
